text: Gideon Ben-Yisrael (; March 6, 1923 â€“ December 18, 2014) was an Israeli politician. He served as a member of the Knesset for Mapai and Rafi in the 1950s and 1960s. He was born in Haifa, Mandatory Palestine. Ben-Yisrael died in Tel Aviv from natural causes, aged 92. He was buried at the Trumpeldor Cemetery in Tel Aviv. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Mapai politicians Category:People from Haifa
title: Gideon Ben-Yisrael
